message:
The Mod Management Update

To update, just press 'Yes' and it should open the installer! If it doesn't, download via the website or Discord.

This update brings dependency warnings, better mod organization, new testing features, and various improvements to make mod management easier.
changelog: Added dependency warnings when installing mods
Improved mod organization with better categories and mod packs
Added Test Mod option and Export ZIP feature for 3rd party mods in right-click menu
Replaced search with comprehensive filtering system
